title: WOODEN : FOOTSTEPS FOREVER
description: High-quality soundpack of footsteps foley on wooden materials
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE

“Due to the availability of a lot of variations of footsteps in each category, now break the monotony and create highly detailed sound design for ‘FOOTSTEPS ON WOODEN MATERIALS’ using this pack.”
